author: craigmcc
msg: Fix for some invalid XML in the stylesheet (<xsl:when> not nested inside
<xml:choose>) that the latest version of Xerces complains about.
Submitted by: Jeff Hutchison <jhut@inst.strykercorp.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Add the first two tags in the new "bean/property" family, including the
additon of the ability to specify the Java class of the object declared by
the "define" tag.

author: craigmcc
msg: Improved Struts logo with the correct font.
Submitted by:	Jason van Zyl <jvanzyl@locus.apache.org>

author: craigmcc
msg: Initial commit of new PropertyUtils module that knows how to deal with
simple, nested (x.y.z) and indexed (a[3]) references to properties.  Not
thoroughly tested yet, but will be utilized in the new set of tags focused
on creating page-scope beans from a variety of sources.

author: craigmcc
msg: Improve the factoring of the stylesheet used to produce the new format
Struts documentation.  Add a stylesheet that takes the same source code
and produces a TLD file.
Add a new-format page for a set of tags focused on creating new beans
(available to the rest of the page) from a variety of sources.  The tags
themselves do not exist yet, but they will shortly.
The new-format documentation will shortly be posted on the Jakarta web
site page for Struts, at <http://jakarta.apache.org/struts>.  Be sure to
check it out and make suggestions for improving the usability of these
documents.
